Symbol.Script_3D:
hotspot 0,0,0,900 if GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE=1 or GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE=2 or GLOB_FEEDBACK_MODE=1 then res = 9 bChamfer=0 show_thread=0 else if GLOB_SEO_TOOL_MODE = 1 then res = 19 else if res<3 then res=13 endif endif if iscall then goto 3001 show_res=res SHADOW OFF, OFF resol show_res material gs_ifc_mat pen gs_cont_pen
roty 90 ! Horizontal rotx xRot roty yRot rotz zRot
if show_hole then ADDZ strart_hole-0.001 if type_hole=2 or type_hole=3 then if abs(coord_hole[1])<abs(coord_hole[2]) then max_r=coord_hole[2] else max_r=coord_hole[1] endif HOTSPOT max_r, 0,0, unID, ang_hole, 4+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, ang_hole, 6: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 1, unID, ang_hole, 7: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT max_r*cos(ang_hole)*0.6, max_r*sin(ang_hole)*0.6,0, unID, ang_hole, 5: unID=unID+1 rotz ang_hole if type_hole=2 then HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT coord_hole[1], 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 3: unID=unID+1 endif HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT coord_hole[2], 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 3: unID=unID+1 del 1 endif if show_hole_axis and show_type = NOT_SHOW then if type_hole=1 then lin_ 0,-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0 lin_ -holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,0 lin_ 0,-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 lin_ -holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001 endif if type_hole=2 then rotz ang_hole lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,0,coord_hole[2]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,0 lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[2]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001 lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0 lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 lin_ coord_hole[2],holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0 lin_ coord_hole[2],holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 del 1 endif if type_hole=3 then rotz ang_hole lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0 lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,0,coord_hole[2]-zas_axis,0,0 lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[2]-zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001 del 1 endif endif del 1 endif
if GLOB_SEO_TOOL_MODE = 1 and show_type<>SHOW_TOP and show_type<>SHOW_SIDE and show_hole and show_res>9 then ADDZ strart_hole-0.001 if type_hole=1 then cylind insideLength+0.001, holeSizeR endif if type_hole=2 or type_hole=3 then rotz ang_hole PUT 0,holeSizeR,15 PUT coord_hole[1],holeSizeR,15 PUT coord_hole[1],0,915 PUT 0,-180,4015 PUT coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR,15 PUT coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR,15 if type_hole=2 then PUT coord_hole[2],0,915 PUT 0,-180,4015 else PUT coord_hole[2],holeSizeR,15 endif PUT 0,holeSizeR,-1 prism_ NSP/3,insideLength+0.001,get(NSP) del 1 endif del 1 end endif
roty -90 call "Условный_болт" PARAMETERS ALL show_type=show_type, insideLength=insideLength, flatWidth=flatWidth, amg2d=amg2d del 1
if show_type = NOT_SHOW and show_res>9 then HOTARC holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9010 addx insideLength hotspot 0,0,0,9011 HOTARC holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9012 del 1 end endif
if show_type<>SHOW_3D then end 3001: IF show_thread gosub 100 ! Bolt IF show_thread THEN gosub 200 ! Thread gosub 300 ! Bolt Head gosub 400 ! Nut gosub 500 ! Washers if not(iscall) then gosub 600 ! Hotspots
del 4
end ! -------------------------------------------
100 : !!! ========== Bolt ========== if abs(lenB-hit) > EPS then cylind lenB-hit, diaB/2 endif addz lenB-hit IF not(show_thread)THEN tpi=0 !!!+++++ cylind hit, diaB/2 - tpi del 1 return
200 : !!! ========== Thread ========== if req ("GDL_version") >= 1.564 then bAC12 = 1 ! >= AC12 totAng = 360*hit/tpi + 360 ! total angle
for k = -stepAng to totAng + stepAng + EPS step stepAng ! phantom points put diaB/2*cos(k), diaB/2*sin(k), tpi*k/360 next k
addz lenB-hit cutplane 1, 1, 0, 1 ! start del 1
addz lenB cutplane 1, 1, 0, 0 ! end del 1
addz lenB - hit - tpi/2
if bAC12 then tubea 4, nsp/3, 1+2+16+32 + 128, ! reduce Polycount 0 , 0 , 0, tpi, tpi/2, 0, tpi, -tpi/2, 0, 0 , 0 , -1, get(nsp) else delta = atn((tpi/2)/tpi) xOff = EPS*cos(delta) ! additional points for rendering yOff = EPS*sin(delta)
tubea 8, nsp/3, 1+2+16+32, 0 , 0 , 0, xOff , yOff , 1, ! rendering tpi-xOff, tpi/2-yOff, 1, ! rendering tpi , tpi/2 , 0, tpi , -tpi/2 , 0, tpi-xOff, -tpi/2+yOff, 1, ! rendering xOff , -yOff , 1, ! rendering 0 , 0 , -1, get(nsp) endif
del 1 cutend cutend return
300 : !!! ========== Bolt Head ========== IF is_stud THEN ADDZ POS_2 if not(no_nut_right) then put -nDia/2, -nDia/2*tan(30) , 15, -nDia/2, nDia/2*tan(30) , 15, 0 , nDia/(2*cos(30)), 15, nDia/2, nDia/2*tan(30) , 15, nDia/2, -nDia/2*tan(30) , 15, 0 , -nDia/(2*cos(30)), 15, -nDia/2, -nDia/2*tan(30) , -1
group "Head" prism_ nsp/3, hThk, get(nsp) endgroup
group "hChamfer" mulz -1 gosub 350 del 1 IF is_stud THEN addz hThk gosub 350 del 1 ENDIF endgroup addz -hThk if not(bChamfer) then placegroup "Head" if bChamfer then placegroup subgroup("Head", "hChamfer") if two_nut_right and is_stud then addz -nThk rotz 90 if not(bChamfer) then placegroup "Head" if bChamfer then placegroup subgroup("Head", "hChamfer") del 2 endif del 1 killgroup "Head" killgroup "hChamfer" endif IF is_stud THEN DEL 1 return
350 : !!! ========== Chamfer ========== if not(bChamfer) then return nutRad = abs(nRad)
put 0 , nutRad , 2, nutRad-nDia/2, 0.96*nDia/2, 2, nutRad-nDia/2, nutRad , 2, 0 , nutRad , -1
roty -90 addx -(nutRad-nDia/2) revolve nsp/3, 360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, get(nsp) del 2
return
400 : !!! ========== Nut ========== if not(no_nut_left) then put -nDia/2, -nDia/2*tan(30) , 15, -nDia/2, nDia/2*tan(30) , 15, 0 , nDia/(2*cos(30)), 15, nDia/2, nDia/2*tan(30) , 15, nDia/2, -nDia/2*tan(30) , 15, 0 , -nDia/(2*cos(30)), 15, -nDia/2, -nDia/2*tan(30) , -1,
0 , 0 , 900, ! smooth hole diaB/2, 0 , 79, diaB/2, 360-stepAng, 4000+79, diaB/2, 0 , -1
group "Nut" prism_ nsp/3, nThk, get(nsp) endgroup
group "nChamfer" mulz -1 gosub 350 del 1
body -1
addz nThk gosub 350 del 1 endgroup
addz nPos + wThk if not(bChamfer) then placegroup "Nut" if bChamfer then placegroup subgroup("Nut", "nChamfer")
if two_nut_left then addz nThk rotz 90 if not(bChamfer) then placegroup "Nut" if bChamfer then placegroup subgroup("Nut", "nChamfer") del 2 endif del 1 killgroup "Nut" killgroup "nChamfer" endif return
500 : !!! ========== Washers ========== if abs (wThk) < EPS then return IF not(is_stud) THEN !!!++++++++ nn = 2 : if no_nut_left then nn=1 for i = 1 to nn prism_ 3, wThk, 0 , 0 , 900+79, wod/2, 360, 4000+79, wid/2, 360, 4000+79
addz nPos next i del nn !!! ПРОСТО ДОБАВИМ++++++++++ ELSE if not(no_nut_left) then ADDZ nPos prism_ 3, wThk, 0 , 0 , 900+79, wod/2, 360, 4000+79, wid/2, 360, 4000+79 DEL 1 endif if not(no_nut_right) then ADDZ POS_2 prism_ 3, wThk, 0 , 0 , 900+79, wod/2, 360, 4000+79, wid/2, 360, 4000+79 DEL 1 endif ENDIF return
600 : !!! ========== Hotspots ========== !!! ----- Length ----- hotspot 0, 0, 0 , uid, lenB, 1+256 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot 0, 0, -1 , uid, lenB, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot 0, 0, lenB, uid, lenB, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving
!!! ----- Nut Position ----- hotspot 0, 0, 0 , uid, nPos, 1 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot 0, 0, -1 , uid, nPos, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot 0, 0, nPos, uid, nPos, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving
!!! ----- Диаметр / Типоразмер ----- muly sgn (nRad) addy -diaB/2 hotspot 0, 0, 0, uid, diaB, 1+128 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot 0, -1, 0, uid, diaB, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref if select = "Диаметр" then hotspot 0, diaB, 0, uid, diaB, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving else hotspot 0, diaB, 0, uid, diaB, 2, refB : uid = uid+1 ! moving endif del 2
!!! ----- Switch ----- addz -hThk hotspot 0, 0 , 0, uid, nRad, 1+128 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot 0, -1 , 0, uid, nRad, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot 0, nRad, 0, uid, nRad, 2, select : uid = uid+1 ! moving del 1
if abs (wThk) < EPS then return hotspot 0, wod/2*sgn(nRad), wThk
return
Symbol.Script_2D:
hotspot2 0,0,9001 ! Резьбa DRAWINDEX 10 project2 3, 270, 2 if yRot=180 then mul2 -1,1 if yRot=270 then mul2 -1,1 LR=nPos+nThk+wThk LR2=nPos IF is_stud THEN LR3=POS_2+wThk LR4=LR3-nThk-wThk if no_nut_right then LR3=POS_2+wThk LR4=LR3 endif ELSE IF thread="Complete" THEN LR3=0 ELSE LR3=lenB-hit ENDIF ENDIF if no_nut_left then LR=nPos
if (type_hole=2 or type_hole=3) and yRot_r=90 then if abs(coord_hole[1])<abs(coord_hole[2]) then max_r=-coord_hole[2] else max_r=-coord_hole[1] endif HOTSPOT2 max_r, 0, unID, ang_hole, 4+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, ang_hole, 6+512*(yRot=90): unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 max_r*cos(-ang_hole)*0.6, max_r*sin(-ang_hole)*0.6, unID, ang_hole, 5: unID=unID+1 rot2 -ang_hole if type_hole=2 then HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -coord_hole[1], 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 3: unID=unID+1 endif HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -coord_hole[2], 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 3: unID=unID+1 del 1 endif
if show_hole2D then if yRot_r=90 and show_type<>SHOW_TOP and show_type<>SHOW_3D then if type_hole=1 then circle2 0,0,holeSizeR HOTARC2 0, 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9005 hotspot2 0,holeSizeR,9006 hotspot2 0,-holeSizeR,9007 hotspot2 holeSizeR,0,9008 hotspot2 -holeSizeR,0,9009 endif if type_hole=2 or type_hole=3 then rot2 -ang_hole PUT 0,holeSizeR,1 PUT -coord_hole[1],holeSizeR,1 PUT -coord_hole[1],0,900 PUT 0,180,4001 PUT -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR,1 PUT -coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR,1 if type_hole=2 then PUT -coord_hole[2],0,900 PUT 0,180,4001 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR,0,9010 hotspot2 -coord_hole[2]+holeSizeR,0,9011 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR,9012 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],holeSizeR,9013 hotspot2 -coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR,9014 hotspot2 -coord_hole[2],holeSizeR,9015 HOTARC2 -coord_hole[1], 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9005 HOTARC2 -coord_hole[2], 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9006 else PUT -coord_hole[2],holeSizeR,1 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR,0 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],holeSizeR HOTARC2 -coord_hole[1], 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9005 endif PUT 0,holeSizeR,-1 poly2_ NSP/3, 1+4,get(NSP) del 1 endif if show_hole_axis then if type_hole=1 then line2 0,-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis line2 -holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0 endif if type_hole=2 then rot2 -ang_hole line2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,-coord_hole[2]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0 line2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,-coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis line2 -coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,-coord_hole[2],holeSizeR+zas_axis endif if type_hole=3 then rot2 -ang_hole line2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,-coord_hole[2]+zas_axis,0 line2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,-coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis endif endif endif if yRot_r=0 then FILL FF ss = 0.0003 IF thread="Partial" AND NOT(is_stud) THEN LR2=nPos LR3=wThk ENDIF DRAWINDEX 20 !!! ЗАКРОЕМ ЛИНИИ POLY2_B 4, 7,FP,BGP, strart_hole+ss, -holeSizeR, 0, strart_hole+insideLength-ss, -holeSizeR, 0, strart_hole+insideLength-ss, holeSizeR, 0, strart_hole+ss, holeSizeR, 0 endif endif
! Hex Bolt Metric bCond = (abs(xRot) < EPS and abs(yRot_r) < EPS and abs(zRot) < EPS) if not(bCond) then end gosub 100 ! Hotspots if show_type<>SHOW_3D then end
IF W_axis THEN !!! ДЕЛАМ ОСЬ+++ LINE_TYPE LT PEN FP IF W_axis THEN LINE2 -wid,0, lenB+wid,0 ENDIF LINE_TYPE 1 PEN gs_cont_pen
!!! ДЕЛАМ БОЛТ - ПОКАЗ РЕЗЬБЫ+++ IF show_hole2D THEN Line2 LR3,-diaB/2+tpi, LR2,-diaB/2+tpi Line2 LR3, diaB/2-tpi, LR2, diaB/2-tpi ENDIF
Line2 LR,-diaB/2+tpi, lenB+tpi,-diaB/2+tpi Line2 LR, diaB/2-tpi, lenB+tpi, diaB/2-tpi
Line2 lenB,-diaB/2, lenB+tpi,-diaB/2+tpi Line2 lenB, diaB/2, lenB+tpi, diaB/2-tpi
Line2 lenB+tpi, diaB/2-tpi, lenB+tpi, -diaB/2+tpi
!!! ДЕЛАМ ШПИЛЬКУ IF is_stud THEN Line2 LR4,-diaB/2+tpi, -tpi,-diaB/2+tpi Line2 LR4, diaB/2-tpi, -tpi, diaB/2-tpi Line2 0,-diaB/2, -tpi,-diaB/2+tpi Line2 0, diaB/2, -tpi, diaB/2-tpi Line2 -tpi, diaB/2-tpi, -tpi, -diaB/2+tpi ENDIF
end ! -------------------------------------------
100 : !!! ========== Hotspots ========== !!! ----- Length ----- hotspot2 0 , 0, uid, lenB, 1+256 : uid = uid+1 ! base (anchor) hotspot2 -1 , 0, uid, lenB, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot2 lenB, 0, uid, lenB, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving
!!! ----- Nut Position -----
hotspot2 0 , 0, uid, nPos, 1 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot2 -1 , 0, uid, nPos, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot2 nPos, 0, uid, nPos, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving
IF is_stud THEN
!!! ШПИЛЬКА ADD2 wThk,0
hotspot2 0 , 0, uid, POS_2, 1 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot2 -1 , 0, uid, POS_2, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot2 POS_2, 0, uid, POS_2, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving
DEL 1
!!!+++++ ЗАЗОР М/У ГАЙКАМИ +++++ ADD2 wThk+POS_2,0
hotspot2 0, DIAB, uid, LZ, 1+128 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot2 -1, 0, uid, LZ, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot2 LZ, DIAB, uid, LZ, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving
DEL 1
ENDIF
!!! ----- Диаметр / Типоразмер ----- mul2 1, sgn (nRad) add2 0, -diaB/2 hotspot2 0, 0, uid, diaB, 1+128 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot2 0, -1, uid, diaB, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref if select = "Диаметр" then hotspot2 0, diaB, uid, diaB, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving else hotspot2 0, diaB, uid, diaB, 2, refB : uid = uid+1 ! moving endif del 2 !!! ----- Switch ----- add2 -hThk, 0 hotspot2 0, 0 , uid, nRad, 1+128 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot2 0, -1 , uid, nRad, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot2 0, nRad, uid, nRad, 2, select : uid = uid+1 ! moving del 1 if abs (wThk) < EPS then return hotspot2 wThk, wod/2*sgn (nRad) return
Symbol.Script_1D:
NOT_SET = -1 NOT_SHOW = 0 SHOW_3D = 1 SHOW_TOP = 2 SHOW_SIDE = 3
TemporaryB = 1 HstrengthB = 2 HanchorB = 3 ManchorB = 4 FoundB = 5
yRot_r = abs(yRot) MOD 180 if yRot_r=90 then rang = 0 else rang = abs(SYMB_ROTANGLE-360*SYMB_MIRRORED) MOD 360 endif
gs_detlevel_3D="" : success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "gs_detlevel_3D", gs_detlevel_3D) if gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` then show_thread=0 bChamfer = 0 res = 5 else res = 36 endif
call "Показ_болтов" PARAMETERS ALL ang1=rang, ang2=yRot_r, el_view=el_view RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_type
EPS = 0.0001 res = min (max (12, res), 72) ! resolution stepAng = 360/res ! step angle uid = 1 ! hotspots zas_axis=0.01
IF is_stud THEN PARAMETERS thread="Complete"
IF not(is_stud) THEN PARAMETERS POS_2=0 HIDEPARAMETER "POS_2","LZ" ENDIF
LX = lenB - (lenB - nPos + wThk + 0.0005) !+nThk С МАЛЕНЬК ЗАЗОРЧИКОМ VALUES "POS_2" RANGE [nThk,LX]
!!!LD=nPos-POS_2-wThk
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="POS_2" THEN PARAMETERS LZ = nPos - POS_2 - wThk IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="nPos" THEN PARAMETERS LZ = nPos - POS_2 - wThk IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="LZ" THEN PARAMETERS nPos = LZ + POS_2 + wThk holeSizeR = (diaB/2)+holeTolerance IF is_stud THEN strart_hole=POS_2+wThk insideLength = nPos - POS_2-wThk ELSE insideLength = nPos - POS_2+nThk-wThk strart_hole=wThk ENDIF PARAMETERS insideLength = insideLength
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_outFIELD "Угол-1 (в плоскости)", 0, 110, 130, 15 UI_outFIELD rang, 30, 130, 100, 15 UI_outFIELD "Угол-2 (из плоскости)", 0, 150, 130, 15 UI_outFIELD yRot_r, 30, 170, 100, 15
UI_outFIELD "Скрыть в виде", 0, 190, 90, 15 ui_infield "el_view", 0, 210, 130, 15 ui_infield "show_hole", 100, 190, 15, 15 ui_tooltip "Оставить отверстие"
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Hex Bolt Metric if len<>0 and lenB<>len then PARAMETERS lenB = len PARAMETERS ang2 = abs(yRot) MOD 180 call "Условный_болт" PARAMETERS ALL
!!! ---------- Values ---------- values "thread" "Partial", "Complete" IF not(is_stud) THEN HIDEPARAMETER "POS_2", "two_nut_right","no_nut_right" PARAMETERS two_nut_right = 0 PARAMETERS no_nut_right = 0 else HIDEPARAMETER "thread" endif gosub 10 ! table
dim diam[18][11] for i = 1 to nsp/11 diam[i][1] = get(1) * 0.001 diam[i][2] = get(1) * 0.001 diam[i][3] = get(1) * 0.001 diam[i][4] = get(1) * 0.001 diam[i][5] = get(1) * 0.001 diam[i][6] = get(1) * 0.001 diam[i][7] = get(1) * 0.001 diam[i][8] = get(1) * 0.001 diam[i][9] = get(1) * 0.001 diam[i][10] = get(1) * 0.001 diam[i][11] = get(1) * 0.001 next i
!!! Create list of bolt Диаметрs if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "diaB" then ! Диаметр for k = 1 to 18 put diam [k][1] next k
values "diaB" get (nsp) ! Диаметр
if abs(diaB-0.0016) < EPS then values "refB" "M1.6" if abs(diaB-0.0020) < EPS then values "refB" "M2" if abs(diaB-0.0025) < EPS then values "refB" "M2.5" if abs(diaB-0.0030) < EPS then values "refB" "M3" if abs(diaB-0.0040) < EPS then values "refB" "M4" if abs(diaB-0.0050) < EPS then values "refB" "M5" if abs(diaB-0.0060) < EPS then values "refB" "M6" if abs(diaB-0.0080) < EPS then values "refB" "M8" if abs(diaB-0.0100) < EPS then values "refB" "M10" if abs(diaB-0.0120) < EPS then values "refB" "M12" if abs(diaB-0.0160) < EPS then values "refB" "M16" if abs(diaB-0.0200) < EPS then values "refB" "M20" if abs(diaB-0.0240) < EPS then values "refB" "M24" if abs(diaB-0.0300) < EPS then values "refB" "M30" if abs(diaB-0.0360) < EPS then values "refB" "M36" if abs(diaB-0.0420) < EPS then values "refB" "M42" if abs(diaB-0.0480) < EPS then values "refB" "M48" if abs(diaB-0.0640) < EPS then values "refB" "M64" else values "refB" "M1.6", "M2", "M2.5", "M3", "M4", "M5", "M6", "M8", "M10", "M12", "M16", "M20", "M24", "M30", "M36", "M42", "M48", "M64" endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "refB" then ! Типоразмер if refB = "M1.6" then values "diaB" 0.0016 if refB = "M2" then values "diaB" 0.0020 if refB = "M2.5" then values "diaB" 0.0025 if refB = "M3" then values "diaB" 0.0030 if refB = "M4" then values "diaB" 0.0040 if refB = "M5" then values "diaB" 0.0050 if refB = "M6" then values "diaB" 0.0060 if refB = "M8" then values "diaB" 0.0080 if refB = "M10" then values "diaB" 0.0100 if refB = "M12" then values "diaB" 0.0120 if refB = "M16" then values "diaB" 0.0160 if refB = "M20" then values "diaB" 0.0200 if refB = "M24" then values "diaB" 0.0240 if refB = "M30" then values "diaB" 0.0300 if refB = "M36" then values "diaB" 0.0360 if refB = "M42" then values "diaB" 0.0420 if refB = "M48" then values "diaB" 0.0480 if refB = "M64" then values "diaB" 0.0640 else for k = 1 to 18 put diam [k][1] next k
values "diaB" get (nsp) ! Диаметр endif
!!! create list of standard lengths while aa < 0.4 + 0.30*(diaB > 0.036) do while aa < 0.2 do while aa < 0.065 do aa = aa + 0.005 if aa >= 2 * diaB then put aa endwhile aa = aa + 0.01 if aa >= 2 * diaB then put aa endwhile aa = aa + 0.02 if aa >= 2 * diaB then put aa endwhile
values "lenB" get(nsp) ! Length
!!! Find nut for chosen bolt Диаметр bCond1 = (lenB < 0.125 or abs(lenB-0.125) < EPS) bCond2 = (lenB > 0.125 and (lenB < 0.200 or abs(lenB-0.200) < EPS)) bCond3 = (lenB > 0.200)
for j = 1 to 18 if abs (diam [j][1] - diaB) < EPS then values "nDia" diam[j][2] ! Nut Диаметр values "nThk" diam[j][3] ! Nut Thickness values "hThk" diam[j][4] ! Head Thickness values "wid" diam[j][5] ! Washer Inner Диаметр values "wod" diam[j][6] ! Washer Outer Диаметр values "wThk" diam[j][7], 0 ! Washer Thickness 0=Off values "tpi" diam[j][8] ! Thread Pitch
if thread = "Partial" then ! Thread Length if bCond1 then values "hit" min (lenB, diam[j][9]) if bCond2 then values "hit" min (lenB, diam[j][10]) if bCond3 then values "hit" min (lenB, diam[j][11]) endif if thread = "Complete" then values "hit" lenB
dist = (diam[j][2]/2)/sin(60) ! nut outer radius flag = (refB = "M3") values "wrench" str (diam[j][2]*1000, 1+flag, flag) ! Wrench endif next j
values "nPos" range [max (wThk, lenB - hit), lenB - wThk - nThk] ! Nut Position
!!! ----- hotspot switch ----- if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "nRad" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "refB" then if nRad > 0 then values "select" "Диаметр" if nRad < 0 then values "select" "Типоразмер" else values "select" "Диаметр", "Типоразмер" endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "select" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "diaB" then if select = "Диаметр" then values "nRad" dist if select = "Типоразмер" then values "nRad" (-dist) else values "nRad" (-dist), dist ! nut outer radius endif
!!! ---------- Parameters ---------- parameters res = res
!!! ---------- Display ---------- if select = "Диаметр" then HIDEPARAMETER "refB" if select = "Типоразмер" then HIDEPARAMETER "diaB"
end ! ------------------------------------------------------------------
10 : !!! diaB | nDia | nThk | hThk | wid | wod | wThk | tpi | hit1 | hit2 | hit3 IF NOT(is_stud) THEN !++++ put 1.6 , 3 , 1.25, 1 , 1.7, 4 , 0.3 , 0.35, 8 , 8 , 8, ! M1.6 ? 2 , 4 , 1.5 , 1.5 , 2.2, 5 , 0.3 , 0.4 , 10 , 10 , 10, ! M2 1st choice 2.5 , 5 , 2 , 1.75, 2.7, 6.5, 0.5 , 0.45, 11 , 11 , 11, ! ! 3.5 , 6 , 2.75, 2.5 , 3.8, 8 , 0.5 , 0.6 , 13 , 13 , 13, ! M3.5 ! 2nd choice ! 14 , 22 , 11.5 , 8.8 , 15 , 28 , 2.5 , 2 , 34 , 40 , 53, ! M14 ! 2 ! 18 , 27 , 15 , 11.5 , 19 , 34 , 3 , 2.5 , 42 , 48 , 61, ! M18 ! 2 ! 22 , 33 , 18 , 14 , 23 , 40 , 3.5 , 2.5 , 50 , 56 , 69, ! M22 ! 2 ! 27 , 41 , 22 , 17 , 28 , 48 , 4 , 3 , 60 , 66 , 79, ! M27 ! 2 ! 33 , 50 , 26 , 21 , 34 , 65 , 5 , 4 , 72 , 78 , 91, ! M33 ! 2 ! 39 , 60 , 31 , 25 , 40 , 75 , 6 , 4.5 , 84 , 90 , 103, ! M39 ! 2 ! 45 , 70 , 36 , 28 , 46 , 85 , 7 , 5 , 96 , 102 , 115 ! M45 ! 2
ELSE !!!+++ ДОБАВИМ ОДИН. ГОЛ. НА ШПИЛЬКУ + LSR +++ !!! diaB | nDia | nThk | hThk | wid | wod | wThk | tpi | hit1 | hit2 | hit3
put 1.6 , 3 , 1.25, 1.25, 1.7, 4 , 0.3 , 0.35, 8 , 8 , 8, ! M1.6 ? 2 , 4 , 1.5 , 1.5, 2.2, 5 , 0.3 , 0.4 , 10 , 10 , 10, ! M2 1st choice 2.5 , 5 , 2 , 2, 2.7, 6.5, 0.5 , 0.45, 11 , 11 , 11, !
